properties.areaDesc: Upper Rio Grande Valley/Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 4:04AM MST until February 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley/Eastern San Juan Mountains
Below 10000 Feet.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MST TUESDAY
